subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Rio Ferdinand, England’s captain, will miss the World Cup with a knee injury, and Didier Drogba of Ivory Coast may miss it after he injured his arm on Friday.
snippet: Rio Ferdinand, England’s captain, will miss the World Cup with a knee injury, and Didier Drogba of Ivory Coast may miss it after he injured his arm on Friday.
